trustfund:
TF027146-PHRD-THIRD ECONOMIC REFORM AND
            DEVELOPMENT LOAN,TF029349-PHRD-TRADE & FINANCIAL
            SECTOR ADJ. LOAN

abstracts.cdata!:
A key objective of the Economic Reform
            and Development Loan Project is to support Jordan to address
            the constraints on its long-term growth imposed by the
            limitation of a small domestic market. The project supports
            trade and investment policy reforms to: 1) remove the
            quota-based preferential treatment of goods originating in
            or going to specific countries, or convert it into a
            full-fledged free trade agreement that satisfies the World
            Trade Organization rules; 2) remove import licensing
            requirements; 3) reduce and restructure tariffs, including
            the elimination of the various import fees and surcharges;
            4) remove tariff exemptions; 5) establish a credible path to
            achieving full long-term trade liberalization; 6) equalize
            domestic taxes on imports and domestically produced goods;
            7) establish a business-enabling investment environment and
            strengthen investment incentives; 8) streamline and
            rationalize customs administration; and 9) improve the
            operations of export development schemes.
